title: On Thanksgiving
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 36 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: Many people celebrate Thanksgiving with various traditions. On Thanksgiving shows how one family celebrates this annual fall holiday. Colorful illustrations accompany simple text and support early-emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to visualize to understand text as well as to sequence events in a story.
